docna.cdata!:
India - Maharasshtra Agricultural Extension
            Project : Credit 1135 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
India - Maharasshtra Agricultural
            Extension Project : Credit 1135 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
India - Maharasshtra Agricultural Extension
            Project : Credit 1135 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
India - Maharasshtra Agricultural
            Extension Project : Credit 1135 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Maharashtra Agricultural Extension
            Project will recognize and strengthen agricultural extension
            services in Maharashtra along the lines of the Training and
            Visit System of extension, which is based on frequent
            in-service training of extension workers and regular,
            scheduled visits by extension workers to farmers'
            fields. The project faces no special risks, although
            realization of the expected benefits will depend heavily on
            the State Government's ability to effectively manage
            the reorganized extension system, maintaining an effective
            single line of command from extension headquarters to the
            field-level workers.
